appearances.title: Prospera, Perception, and Post-Scarcity
appearances.summary: Deep dive into Prospera's governance model, how perception shapes policy outcomes, and why post-scarcity economics changes everything we think about incentives.

appearances.title: Debating 'The Network State' Part II, Balaji's Bet, Education in a Free Society & More
appearances.summary: Follow-up discussion on Balaji Srinivasan's Network State thesis, his Bitcoin bet, thoughts on education in a free society, and wide-ranging riffs and rambles.

appearances.title: How to Build a Startup City
appearances.summary: Discussion on the practical challenges and lessons learned from building Prospera as a startup city from the ground up.

appearances.title: Debating 'The Network State' by Balaji Srinivasan
appearances.summary: Critical discussion of Balaji Srinivasan's Network State thesis from the perspective of someone actually building a special jurisdiction.

appearances.title: Prospectus On Próspera
appearances.summary: Extensive Q&A with Scott Alexander covering Prospera's founding, governance structure, legal framework, and vision for the future of charter cities.

appearances.title: The Epicenter Podcast (Co-Host)
appearances.summary: Co-hosted with Max Medina (2020-2021). Conversations about innovation, governance, and building the future from Próspera.

appearances.title: The Voluntaryist Constitution
appearances.summary: Episode 50. Discussion of the theoretical framework for a constitution designed around voluntary association and consent-based governance.

appearances.title: A Constitution for a Free Society
appearances.summary: Discussing the principles and design of constitutional frameworks that maximize individual liberty and voluntary cooperation.
